hello English learners welcome to daily
video vocabulary episode 77 in today's
episode I have a new idiom for you to
have your heart in your mouth let's find
out what it means and how you can use it
in your daily conversation to have your
heart in your mouth have you ever felt
anxious or scared about something and
you just don't know what to do the idiom
to have your heart in your mouth
basically means to be nervous or scared
about something when you are nervous or
scared your heart starts pounding and
there's a choking feeling in your throat
and you actually feel you have your
heart in your mouth so when you are
extremely anxious about something that
may happen it means you have your heart
in your mouth for example when your exam
result is going to be declared you are
so nervous and anxious that you have
your heart and your mouth this could be
because you weren't prepared for your
exams so passing the exam is down for
okay now that you know what this idiom
means let's take a look at some example
sentences to see how you can use it in
your daily conversation example one
little Mary had her heart in her mouth
when she had decided to get on the
roller coaster at the amusement park
example two michelle was so nervous for
her first interview that she had her
heart in her mouth while she was waiting
for her turn example3 having bonked most
of the lectures in her final year of
college Lisa had her heart in her mouth
when she found her name blacklisted
on the bulletin board example 4 although
Eric was all set with his presentation
he had his heart in his mouth as he was
presenting for the first time example 5
the soccer fans had their heart in their
mouth while watching a very close match
and they couldn't wait to see their
favorite team win example 6 after the
company was declared insolvent all the
employees had their heart in their
mouths as their jobs were at stake
example 7 when Maria's boyfriend
introduced her to his grandmother she
laid her heart in her mouth as she was
not sure if she will be accepted by his
family example 8 the sisters had their
heart in their mouth while watching the
horror film at night
example 9 when PETA was fired from his
job he had his heart in his mouth as he
was the only breadwinner for his family
that's the end of today's episode is
